active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group discussion, debate the organizational resilience provided by supply chain security controls against nation-state attacks like SolarWinds. How do foundational CIS Controls 7-16 extend internal security (from Controls 1-6) to the supply chain ecosystem? Support arguments with mappings to NIST SP 800-161 and ISO 28000.

active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.
